text: Well I love it here the food is always good and hot the staff is friendly I love it as matter of fact I'm on my there now...

I am NEVER EVER coming in this establishment again! Since changing the name from Floyds the service has been horrible! The food may be the same but the customer service is atrocious. The front counter staff look unhappy and more importantly treat the customers with disdain. I am not a person who spends my money anywhere that custom service is not a priority!
They have good old fashioned down south food. Fried chick Mac cheese and greens the best
